text: Atahpara yakhana tara i'usuphera kache upasthita hala takhana tara balala, ‘he ‘ayiya! Amara o amadera paribara-parijana bipanna haye parechi ebam amara tuccha pumji niye esechi [1]; apani amadera rasada purna matraya dina ebam amadera prati anugraha karuna [2]; niscaya'i allah‌ anugrahakaridera puraskrta karena [3].’
